about.heading: About Us
about.subtitle: We bring dead batteries back to life ‚Äî and help save the planet in the process.

left.title: Industrial Battery Restoration Experts
left.text: BSF was built to save our customers money and reduce battery waste. We restore forklift, UPS, golf cart, and other lead-acid batteries for commercial and industrial clients.

right.title: Our Mission
right.text: To reduce industrial battery waste and offer sustainable solutions that benefit both our clients and the environment.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our simple 3-step process helps you save time, money, and the environment.

steps.title: We Evaluate
steps.description: We assess your industrial batteries to determine if they‚Äôre good candidates for restoration.

steps.title: We Restore
steps.description: Using our proprietary technology, we bring your batteries back to peak performance.

steps.title: You Save
steps.description: You avoid costly replacements and help reduce environmental waste.

undertext.text: Our exclusive process is the key to producing batteries with unparalleled performance, backed by a 2-year warranty on our refurbished units.

newLife.title: New Life for Forklift Batteries
newLife.description: We specialize in restoring performance for electric forklifts, scissor lifts, and stackers with reliable battery reconditioning.

whyChooseUs.title: We Bring Batteries Back to Life ‚Äì Better Than New
whyChooseUs.description: Our process delivers unmatched performance, value, and environmental impact.

features.title: Proprietary Technology

help.title: Battery Solutions of Florida
help.description: From extending battery life to eco-friendly solutions, we‚Äôre here to provide expert restoration, maintenance, and advice tailored to your needs.

services.description: This service allows us to directly assess and diagnose battery issues at the customer‚Äôs location, providing a more immediate and personalized approach.

list.name: Sara Rzendzian
list.text: I recently used BSF for my EV battery issues and was amazed by the results. Their eco-friendly approach gave my battery new life, significantly boosting its performance...

list.name: Oliver Sandhaous
list.text: The quality of the battery restoration exceeded our expectations. Our batteries now perform like new. It's refreshing to see a company that not only delivers on performance...

list.name: Jessica Lang
list.text: Excellent service and very professional staff. They restored my forklift battery and now it works better than ever. Highly recommend BSF!

list.name: David Munoz
list.text: Impressed by how thorough and sustainable the restoration process was. Saved us a lot of money and helped reduce waste.
